name: ensign
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a flag on a ship that shows which country the ship belongs to
eugenesergeev/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
the lowest rank of officer in the British army or the US navy: He has advanced from an ensign to a lieutenant junior grade.
